summary: This module supplies a set of straightforward logical, bitwise, and Boolean helper routines along with illustrative example functions that are used as inputs for the classical function compiler, demonstrating the translation of classical computations into quantum circuit representations.
business_intent: Offer ready-made example functions for developers and researchers to test, validate, and document the classical-to-quantum compilation workflow within the Qiskit ecosystem, supporting the development and verification of quantum algorithms that rely on compiled classical logic.
